summary:
- **Announcement Type**: Employee incentive issuance (unquoted Performance Rights)  
- **Security Details**:  
  - Class: Performance Rights Class L (expiring 6 August 2027)  
  - Quantity Issued**: 10,000,000 (non-quoted)  
  - Issue Date**: 6 August 2025  
  - Recipient**: Employee (non-KMP) under Employee Securities Incentive Plan  
  - Vesting Condition**: Subject to production of Graphite Blocks meeting specified density/thermal diffusivity properties using proprietary Press technology.  
  - **Material Transfer**: Upon vesting, 100% ownership of Press tech transfers to the company.  
- **Post-Issue Capital Structure**:  
  - Ordinary Shares (GCM): 2,461,875,331  
  - Unquoted Securities**: Includes 203,915,233 existing Performance Rights (GCMAE) + 10M new Class L Rights.  

No material impact on liquidity/capital structure (non-dilutive issuance under Listing Rule 7.2 exception 13).
